name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior R&D Engineer with over 13 years of experience in full stack development and a strong foundation in C++, C, and electronic design. Proficient in version control with **GIT** and has hands-on experience with **MFC** and **STM32** frameworks. Demonstrated ability to deliver innovative electronic solutions while ensuring high-performance and compliance standards. Highly skilled in developing AI/ML-driven applications with a robust understanding of **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in designing and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, focusing on microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Committed to aligning projects with regulatory standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS, and experienced in MLOps practices utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
